content.question: This source is significant because it provides an example of

choices.label: enslaved people bringing skills to the Americas, including blacksmithing and basket weaving
the increased anxiety about revolts of enslaved people caused by the influx of Black refugees from Haiti
resistance by enslaved people including slowing work and self-emancipating
resistance that led to the well-organized rebellion by enslaved people at Stono

content.answer: resistance by enslaved people including slowing work and self-emancipating

topic.text: 2.13: Resistance and Revolts in the United States
